name: nodejs-serverless-backend
description: Backend pattern for AWS Lambda and GCP AppEngine

scripts.sync-node: cp src/.gitignore build/ && cp src/package.json build/
scripts.sync-all: npm run sync-node && npm run sync-svless && npm run sync-firebase
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run sync-all
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd build && npm install --only=production && serverless deploy && cd ../ && rm -R build
scripts.merge-master: git checkout master && git merge dev && git push origin master && git checkout dev

author: Nicheal Pham
